section.heading: Special Education Reform Plan.
section.text: The Superintendent of Schools shall develop a Special Education Reform Plan (“Reform Plan”) which shall include the following:

para.text: Roles and responsibilities of all District agencies that provide special education related services;
Targeted savings activities for fiscal years 2003 through 2005; and
Continued review and input from Task Force members.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 4 of Special Education Task Force Establishment Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-232, November 25, 2003, 50 DCR 10729).
